HELP.COMMANDS:
/help: Shows this help list. 
/register: Request access to start using the bot. 
/food [food name] | [score]: Rate a dish from 1 (hate) to 5 (love). 
/list food: View all the dishes you've rated with their scores. 
/allergy [food name]: Add a food you are allergic to. 
/list allergies: View my list of allergen foods.

LIST.FORMAT_ERROR: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please specify a correct list name. Example: /list food or /list allergies
